name: IoWarp Runtime
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'git config --global --add safe.directory /workspace && sudo rm -rf /home/iowarp/.ssh && sudo cp -r /tmp/host-ssh /home/iowarp/.ssh && sudo chown -R iowarp:iowarp /home/iowarp/.ssh && chmod 700 /home/iowarp/.ssh && chmod 600 /home/iowarp/.ssh/* && chmod 644 /home/iowarp/.ssh/*.pub 2>/dev/null || true && sudo cp -r /tmp/host-claude /home/iowarp/.claude && sudo cp /tmp/host-claude.json /home/iowarp/.claude.json && sudo chown -R iowarp:iowarp /home/iowarp/.claude /home/iowarp/.claude.json'
